医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
移民医疗保健专业人员：美国卫生系统的重要支柱贝克公共政策研究所的一项研究强调了移民医疗保健专业人员在美国卫生系统中的关键作用，研究了他们日益增加的存在以及 J-1 签证交流访问者计划等法律途径的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Immigrant-healthcare-professionals-essential-pillars-of-the-US-health-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Immigrant-healthcare-professionals-essential-pillars-of-the-US-health-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30826913-ce42-4021-9e2e-474c4544722f Mon, 08 Jan 2024 00:10:00 -0500 Immigrant healthcare professionals: essential pillars of the U.S. health system
SARS-CoV-2 感染人类的​​能力是否源自其进化历史？研究挑战了 SARS-CoV-2 进化过程中基因重组的假说，基于对 100 多个病毒基因组的分析，表明其祖先病毒已经具有人类感染特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Does-SARS-CoV-2s-ability-to-infect- humans-stem-from-its-evolutionary-past.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Does-SARS-CoV-2s-ability-to-infect- humans-stem-from-its-evolutionary-past.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f6c516f-4f11-4632-9fbd-f224279b246f Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:54:00 -0500 Does SARS-CoV-2's ability to infect humans stem from its evolutionary past?
AI可以预测糖尿病眼病进展吗？ “DeepDR Plus”是一种深度学习系统，可使用眼底图像准确预测长达五年的糖尿病视网膜病变进展，为糖尿病患者的个性化筛查和管理提供了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Can-AI-predict-diabetic-eye-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Can-AI-predict-diabetic-eye-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32e3c676-4970-4b40-af35-8c9dd1903aec Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:28:00 -0500 Can AI predict diabetic eye disease progression?
解锁 COVID-19 疫苗反应的基因钥匙英国生物银行的一项全基因组关联研究揭示了影响 SARS-CoV-2 IgG 血清状态的遗传因素，强调了 HLA II 类基因在针对 COVID-19 疫苗的可变免疫反应中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Genetic-keys-to-COVID-19-vaccine-response-unlocked.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Genetic-keys-to-COVID-19-vaccine-response-unlocked.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ba9c3e2-4b69-4870-af88-d61897d7e4e0 Sun, 07 Jan 2024 23:10:00 -0500 Genetic keys to COVID-19 vaccine response unlocked
在美国治疗 COVID-19 的住院费用研究分析了 COVID-19 患者的平均住院护理费用，揭示了大流行浪潮和患者人口统计数据中费用的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/InPatient-costs-of-treatment-COVID-19-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/InPatient-costs-of-treatment-COVID-19-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5bf7fa2-16ae-49d1-96cd-125feb95d9d0 Sun, 07 Jan 2024 22:50:00 -0500 Inpatient costs of treating COVID-19 in the U.S.
芝麻蛋白衍生肽有望对抗大肠杆菌和金黄色葡萄球菌《Nutrients》中的一项研究表明，芝麻蛋白衍生的肽 Ala-Gly-Gly-Val-Pro-Arg 和 Ser-Thr-Ile-Arg 对大肠杆菌和金黄色葡萄球菌表现出有效的抗菌活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-蛋白质衍生肽-show-promise-in-fighting-E-coli-and-S-aureus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-蛋白质衍生肽-show-promise-in-fighting-E-coli-and-S-aureus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2edaa552-e898-4d9d-9c29-ad4eb7bb9b8b Sun, 07 Jan 2024 22:35:00 -0500 Sesame protein-derived peptides show promise in fighting E. coli and S. aureus
依折麦布和贝培多酸联合使用可有效降低他汀类药物不耐受患者的胆固醇一项对超过 200 万德国门诊患者进行分析的模拟研究发现，结合依折麦布和 bempedoic 酸可有效降低他汀类药物不耐受的高胆固醇血症患者的 LDL 胆固醇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Combining-ezetimibe-and-bempedoic-acid- effectively-lowers-cholesterol-in-statin-in Tolerance-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Combining-ezetimibe-and-bempedoic-acid- effectively-lowers-cholesterol-in-statin-in Tolerance- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11cc572b-08f4-4d2f-8577-80e7521a358f Sun, 07 Jan 2024 22:13:00 -0500 Combining ezetimibe and bempedoic acid effectively lowers cholesterol in statin-intolerant patients
补充芝麻油：预防绝经后骨质疏松症的潜在突破？研究发现，每日补充芝麻油可以通过增强骨形成、减少骨吸收以及维持血清雌激素和芳香酶水平来预防卵巢切除大鼠的骨质疏松症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-oil-supplementation-a-potential-breakthrough-in-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Sesame-oil-supplementation-a-potential-breakthrough-in-postmenopausal-osteoporosis-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35c49271-5252-484e-a951-efb28c20c06e Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:56:00 -0500 Sesame oil supplementation: a potential breakthrough in postmenopausal osteoporosis prevention?
大脑波动会促进情绪记忆编码吗？研究人员发现，大脑中的编码后涟漪通过改善刺激识别和唤醒来增强情绪记忆，这表明对显着事件的选择性强化有助于记忆巩固。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Do-brain-ripples-boost-emotional-memory-encoding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Do-brain-ripples-boost-emotional-memory-encoding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbaf639f-4100-49c5-ab85-82a8c198b96c Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:48:00 -0500 Do brain ripples boost emotional memory encoding?
肠道酶的发现揭示了人类胆红素平衡研究人员发现 BilR 是一种肠道微生物衍生酶，对于将胆红素转化为尿胆原至关重要，从而影响人类胆红素稳态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Gut-enzyme-discovery-sheds-light-on-bilirubin-balance-in- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240107/Gut-enzyme-discovery-sheds-light-on-bilirubin-balance-in- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db0dafe0-2f0d-4a04-91f9-28e052812411 Sun, 07 Jan 2024 18:39:00 -0500 Gut enzyme discovery sheds light on bilirubin balance in humans
